product_overview: Iris is an advanced AI-powered chat application designed to assist blind and visually impaired students in interacting with documents via natural language. It supports document upload, Q&A, summarization, and advanced AI content processing with a focus on accessibility and modern UI/UX.
core_goals: Enable easy uploading of various document formats with drag-and-drop support.
Provide a responsive, accessible, and user-friendly chat interface for real-time Q&A and conversation history.
Support advanced AI features such as automated document summarization and CPA (Content Processing Agent) based processing.
Ensure comprehensive accessibility with dark mode, animations, and assistive UI components.
Integrate seamlessly with a backend RAG API for document retrieval and AI processing.
key_features: Document Upload page supporting PDF, TXT, DOC, DOCX, MD, and JSON formats with real-time feedback.
Chat Interface allowing users to ask questions, view conversation history with timestamps, and see loading indicators.
Quick Action tools such as automatic document summaries and CPA Agent processing.
Modern, accessible UI built with Radix UI components, Tailwind CSS styling, and theme provider for dark/light modes.
Responsive navigation bar with mobile and desktop menus, smooth scrolling, and active state indicators.
Custom React hooks for interacting with the backend RAG API, mobile detection, and toast notifications.
Extensive UI component library for consistent interface elements and improved development efficiency.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Home Page and views the hero section with feature highlights and chat preview.
User navigates to the Document Upload page to upload files using drag-and-drop or file selector.
Uploaded documents are processed and made available for query via the Chat Interface.
User asks questions in the Chat Interface, receives answers in real-time, and can access document summaries or use the CPA Agent.
User can navigate between pages such as About, Services, and Contact using the responsive navigation bar.
Theme provider allows toggling between dark and light modes for better accessibility and user comfort.
validation_criteria: Document uploads must support all specified file formats and provide real-time feedback on the upload status.
The Chat Interface must display real-time responses with conversation history and loading indicators.
AI-driven features like document summarization and CPA processing must return accurate and timely results.
UI components must adhere to accessibility standards, including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
The navigation bar must be fully responsive with functional desktop and mobile menus.
Theme switching between dark and light modes should be seamless and preserved across user sessions.
Integration with the RAG backend API should handle errors gracefully and maintain session state.
